    1.0

    Danilo Navas (den34)

      • isLegalMove

        boolean isLegalMove​(Piece target,
                    int targetX,
                    int targetY)
        Method to determine if next move for piece is legal
        Parameters:
        target - The target piece that this piece will replace
        targetX - The rank of the target piece
        targetY - The file of the target piece
        Returns:
        true|false
